Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Ifosfamide is approved to be used with other drugs to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Testicular germ cell tumors that are malignant. It is used in patients who have already been treated with two other types of chemotherapy.

Section.Para: Ifosfamide is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
